properties.name: security.jwt.issuer
properties.description: The 'iss' (issuer) claim identifies the principal that issued the JWT.

properties.name: security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Signing key to use to digitally sign the JWT. By default, a random UUID is generated.

properties.name: security.jwt.header
properties.description: Name of the header that contains the JWT.

properties.name: security.jwt.cookie
properties.description: Name of the cookie that contains the JWT.
